Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Permits records required to be disclosed under the freedom of information law to have exempt parts of such documents be redacted before disclosure
Summary: Permits records required to be disclosed under the freedom of information law to have exempt parts of such documents be redacted before disclosure.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to permitting records required to be disclosed under the freedom of information law to have exempt parts of such documents be redacted before disclosure
